resources.string: AirPurifier solution
AirPurifier
Connect with your AirPurifier
2. Make sure your device is powered on
Press the power button to turn your device on.
3. Is the device in setup-mode?
Follow the instructions to put your device in Setup-mode.\n Is the Wi-Fi light blinking?
Yes, Wi-Fi is blinking
No, Wi-Fi is not blinking
Has %1$s left setup?
Has your %1$s left setup mode?\n Is the Wi-Fi light still blinking?
Enable the setup mode on the %1$s
Please, enable the setup mode on the %1$s
Try setting up regardless
Usually you can setup device in this state, Please try setting it up. \nOtherwise, try to enable setup mode again.
Accidently connect with wrong phone?
If your device has been connected to another phone by accident, then you can control the AirPurifier with that phone.
Make sure your device is powered on
Proposition specific instructions to power the device.
